definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: The axis of rotation and its support are part of the central pedestal.
sentences.chinese: 旋转轴和它的支撑结构是中央操作台的一部分。

sentences.english: The shape of the molecule of the compound is in chain configuration having diad axis.
sentences.chinese: 该化合物分子为链状结构，具有2次旋转轴。

sentences.english: A method of infrared short range telemetry for torque measurement of rotating shaft is stated.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种对旋转轴扭矩测试的红外近程遥测法。

sentences.english: A device used to seal around a reciprocating or rotating shaft or spindle.
sentences.chinese: 围绕往复或旋转轴或心轴进行密封所用的装置。

sentences.english: For the moment of inertia, we want the square of a distance to the axis of rotation.
sentences.chinese: 至于转动惯量，要求的其实是到旋转轴距离的平方。

sentences.english: Just I would have to sum the square of a distance to the axis of rotation.
sentences.chinese: 只要计算到旋转轴距离的平方的总和。

sentences.english: The key point for re-constructing rotation surface is setting up rotation axis and generatrix.
sentences.chinese: 旋转面重建的关键是确定旋转轴和母线。

definition: to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
backwards and forwards action (e.g. of piston or pump)/reciprocating motion
